en_text: Marukawa Publishing Glossary #19
jp_text: 丸川書店用語集第十九回は部決会議

en_text: In this meeting, the company decides \Nhow many copies of a book to print.
jp_text: 部決会議とは　刊行する本が発行部数を決定する会議のこと

en_text: At Marukawa, the participants are the \Nmanaging director and representatives
